mapper.select: SELECT a.memberID ,a.memberName ,a.memberMobile ,a.memberMailName ,a.memberMailDomain ,a.memberPlace FROM member a WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{mainKey}
SELECT a.itemHeader ,a.itemPrice ,a.itemBuyDatetime ,a.itemSaleNY FROM item a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.member_seq1 = #{mainKey} AND a.itemSaleNY = 1
SELECT a.itemHeader ,a.itemPrice ,a.itemRegDatetime ,a.itemSaleNY ,a.itemSeq FROM item a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.member_seq = #{mainKey}
SELECT a.itemHeader ,a.itemPrice ,a.itemSeq ,b.member_seq ,b.item_seq from itemCart b join item a on b.item_seq = a.itemseq WHERE 1=1 AND b.member_seq = #{mainKey};
